monsters.name: Caracal
traits: The caracal can see in the night to 60 ft. as she would see at daylight.
The caracal gets advantage on **Acrobatics** checks and can move at normal speed on difficult terrains.
The caracal gets advantage on **Perception** checks based on her vision.
The caracal gets advantage on **Stealth** checks hiding in her natural environment (forests, deserts).
actions: _Melee Weapon Attack_: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., on target. Hit: 1d6 +2 slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 **Strength** saving throw or be knocked prone.
_Melee Weapon Attack_: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., on target. Hit: 1d6 +2 piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it bleeds 1d4 physical damage per turn until gets healed or stabilized.

traits.name: Keen Sight
traits.desc: The caracal gets advantage on **Perception** checks based on her vision.

actions.name: Longsword

monsters.name: King Grol

traits.name: Brute
traits.desc: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).

traits.name: Surprise Attack
traits.desc: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage from the attack.

traits.name: Snarl!
traits.desc: King Grol always fights with his Dire Wolf Snarl. Snarl acts on its own initiative count.

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage in melee or 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage at range.

traits+: King Grol always fights with his Dire Wolf Snarl. Snarl acts on its own initiative count.

bonus_actions.name: Have a bite!
bonus_actions.desc: As a bonus actionif King Grol is able to speakhe can order Snarl to use its Bite attack on a creature in range of said Attack.

lair_actions.name: Summon bodyguards (2 times)
lair_actions.desc: King Grol can summon his Goblinoid underlings if he's afraid of dying. On initiative count 20 (losing ties), Grol summons 1 Hobgoblin or 2 Goblins from around the castle. The goblinoids will take their turns on the Lair's initiative count. He can summon these goblins only when he gets below 50% HP or when Snarl dies.

reactions.name: Field experience
reactions.desc: As a reaction, King Grol can move up to its speed towards a hostile creature it can see.

reactions.name: Goblinoid Warlord
reactions.desc: King Grol adds its proficiency bonus to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it as a reaction.
